title: Data Visualization on Bicycle Theft Data
description: Utilized Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Flask, and PowerBI for data analysis, developed robust models, and enhanced visualizations for decision-making.

title: ETL Pipeline with Azure Data Factory
description: Implemented an ETL pipeline using Azure Data Factory, streamlining data processing, constructing data workflows, managing pipelines with precision, Azure Blob Storage and SQL Database for efficient storage.
